All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AttributesReader
Utility class to read Attributes from Keycloak's Client and User Structure
ClientIPValidationFactory
Client IP Validation Factory which implements Keycloak Authentication Factory.
ClientIPValidationFactoryCustomUserStore
Client IP Validation Factory which implements Keycloak Authentication Factory.
ClientIPValidator
This SPI for Keycloak checks for IP based validation for a user.
ClientIPValidatorCustomUserStore
This SPI for Keycloak checks for IP based validation for a user.
Constants
Keycloak SPI Constants
DBUtil
This is a singleton DB Util class for reading some DB table if needed.
GeoIp2Util
This Utility class will load GeoIP2 DB in cache and provides util class for checking of IP against the GeoIP DB.
IpRangeCheckUtil
This utility class checks an IP to be present in the range of IP address passed.
ISmsService
SMS send interface
KcUser
This class is the Keycloak custom User entity object
KcUserAdapter
Adapter over KCUser class.
KcUserRepository
Repository class for KCUser entity object
KcUserRoleModel
Implementation of Keycloak's RoleModel for KCUser entity
KcUserStorageProvider
This SPI extends Keycloak UserStorage to use our custom Users from KcUser database table.
KcUserStorageProviderFactory
User Storage Provider Factory class for implementing custom User Storage SPI
SmsAuthenticator
This SPI can be used to send SMS OTP for Login Authentication using Keycloak.
SmsAuthenticatorCustomUserStore
This SPI can be used to send SMS OTP for Login Authentication using Keycloak.
SmsAuthenticatorFactory
Factory class for SMS OTP send SPI
SmsAuthenticatorFactoryCustomUserStore
Factory class for SMS OTP send SPI
SmsServiceFactory
SMS Service factory
SmsServiceImpl
Sms Service Implementation for sending of SMS
